name: Captain's Diary
description:
Captain's Diary is a short platforming shooter wherein a girl imagines herself to be an astronaut fighting vegetables to get her candy bar.

  • A and D to move
  • Space to Jump/Boost
  • Aim/Shoot with the mouse

This game was created as an entry to the Bored Pixel Jam and all of the assets were created during the jam

Credit to Hadithi for the script, voice over, play testing

Credit to IntoxIllusions for the art
